name: Yukikaze
acquisitionMethod: Limited Build (Visitors Dyed in Red Rerun)

1.name: Yukikaze of Kure
1.description: As long as this ship is alive, reduce damage taken by main fleet by 3.5% (8.0%). When a main fleet ship drops below 20% health, recover said ship's health by 4.0% (10.0%), applying only once per battle.

2.name: Unsunk Lucky Ship
2.description: When receiving damage, 5.0% (25.0%) chance of reducing said damage to 1.

3.name: Full Barrage I (II)
3.description: Every 15 (10) times the main battery is fired, trigger Full Barrage - Yukikaze I (II)

2.name: Sovereign of the Swing
2.description: Wa ha ha! My "universal-as-long-as-there-is-a-ceiling" swing set is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Want to give it a try? Too~ bad~! This seat is reserved only for the noble and elegant Yukikaze!

3.name: The Warmth of Spring
3.description: This outfit is sooo cute~ ehehe... Ack!! *cough* *cough*! Ahem! From now on, you are the faithful companion of Yukikaze the Great! As such, you will not be permitted to leave my side, understood?

limitBreak.tier2: Torpedo Base +1 / Torpedo Pre-Load +1 / Torpedo Efficiency +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Full Barrage I → II / All Weapon Efficiency +5%

1.chinese: 阳炎级驱逐舰八番舰—雪风
1.japanese: 陽炎型駆逐艦八番艦・雪風

2.chinese: 听好了，我乃高贵的，幸运的，无敌的，雪风·Eight·阳炎The.Geni……（咬舌）什么啊，这个词好难念啊！（低声）咳咳，总而言之，能得到我是你的幸运，你就尽管依靠本大人的运气吧，HO,HO,HO！
2.chineseTL: Listen up, I am the noble, lucky, invincible Yukikaze-Eigth-Kagerou The.Geni... *bites tongue* what the heck, that word is so hard to say! *Whisper* *Cough cough* Anyways, since you're fortunate to have me, you may rely completely on my luck, HO, HO, HO!
2.japanese: よく聞け！えっと…このわたしこそ高貴で幸運で無敵の！雪風・エイト・陽炎・ザジェネ…なんなのよこれ！言いづらい！… コホンコホン、とにかく、このわたしを手に入れられるあんたは幸せ者なのだ！思う存分このわたしの幸運に頼るがいいのだ！ハッハッハッ！
2.japaneseTL: Listen up! Let's see... I am the noble, lucky, invincible! Yukikaze-Eight-Kagerou-The Geni... the heck is this! It's so hard to say!... Ahem, anyway, you're a fortunate person to have obtained me! You may rely completely on my luck! Ha-ha-ha!
2.english: Listen up! I'm the noble, lucky, invincible, magni... magnici... the 8th ship of the Kagerou-class, Yukikaze the Great! What the heck... that word's so hard to pronounce... Ahem! Anyway, I shall be your lucky star from now on, so be grateful! Wa ha ha!

3.chinese: 哼哼哼，作为你来到我面前的奖赏，我幸运的雪风大人就加入你的舰队！感到光荣吧！
3.chineseTL: He-he-he, as a reward for coming before me, the lucky great Yukikaze shall join your fleet! Feel honored!
3.japanese: ふんふんふーん、ここまでたどり着いたご褒美に、この幸運の雪風様が加わってやるのだ！光栄に思うのだ♪
3.japaneseTL: Ufufufu, as a reward for getting this far, the lucky Yukikaze-sama shall join you! You should feel honored ♪
3.english: Hehehe~ As a reward for making it this far, the lucky Yukikaze the Great shall join you! You should feel honored!

4.chinese: 终于回来了，为了雪风大人赶紧好好工作吧！
4.chineseTL: You finally came back, better hurry up to work for the great Yukikaze's sake!
4.japanese: よく戻ったのだ！この雪風様のために働くのだ！
4.japaneseTL: You finally came back! Now work for the sake of Yukikaze-sama!
4.english: You've finally returned! Now, get to work for Yukikaze the Great!

5.chinese: 雪风大人的英姿就随你看个高兴吧！
5.chineseTL: You are allowed to look at the great Yukikaze's heroic figure until you're satisfied!
5.japanese: 雪風様の勇姿を存分に見るのだ！
5.japaneseTL: Feast your eyes on the heroic figure of Yukikaze-sama!
5.english: Feast your eyes upon the heroic majesty of Yukikaze the Great!

6.chinese: HO,HO,HO，雪风大人可是无敌的口牙！
6.chineseTL: HO, HO, HO, the great Yukikaze is invincible at wordplay!
6.japanese: ハッハッハッ！雪風様は無敵なのだ！
6.english: Wa ha ha! Yukikaze the Great is invincible!

7.chinese: 指挥官，你求我的话也不是不能帮你一下哦~
7.chineseTL: Commander, it's not as if I can't help, as long as you beg for it~
7.japanese: そんなに頼むんなら助けてあげなくもないのだぞ~
7.japaneseTL: If you beg me like that I just can't help giving you a hand~
7.english: If you beg me like that, I have no choice but to lend you my aid!

8.chinese: Na,Nya……哼，雪风大人心情好，就难得满足一下你
8.chineseTL: Na, nya... Hm! The great Yukikaze is feeling great, I will indulge you a bit
8.japanese: ふにゃ…ふん、雪風様は機嫌がいいから付き合っているだけなのだ！
8.japaneseTL: Funya... Hm, Yukikaze-sama is in a great mood so I'll be spending time with you!
8.english: Eheh~ Hmph. Yukikaze the Great is only giving you the time of day because she's in a good mood!

9.chinese: 瞧你那傻样，结果还是要依靠雪风大人我呢~
9.chineseTL: Looking at your poor face, seems like you need to rely on the great Yukikaze~
9.japanese: そんな顔して、結局この雪風様のおかげなのだ~
9.japaneseTL: Looking at your face, in the end it was all thanks to Yukikaze-sama~
9.english: Look at that face of yours~ It's only because of me, Yukikaze the Great!

10.chinese: 你以为我不会过来吗？成熟的雪风大人才不会那么幼稚，哼！
10.chineseTL: Did you think I wouldn't come over? The mature and wise Yukikaze isn't that childish, hmph!
10.japanese: こっちから仕掛けられない思った？大人の雪風様はあんたみたいに子供っぽいことしないのだ！ふん！
10.japaneseTL: Did you think I would be the one starting a fight? The mature Yukikaze-sama isn't childish like you! Hmph!
10.english: You thought I wouldn't come over? Hmph! Unlike you, Yukikaze the Great is mature and would never do something so childish!

11.chinese: 呼……吓我一跳（小声）嗯？没什么
11.chineseTL: Huh... you scared me *murmur* Ah? It was nothing
11.japanese: ふぅ……びっくりした…うん？なにもないのだ！
11.japaneseTL: Phew... you scared me... Hm? It was nothing!
11.english: Phew... that was scary... Huh? I didn't say anything!

12.japanese: あんた……まさか……うぐ……！もう死んじゃえ！
12.japaneseTL: You... dare... Uguu...! Just die already!
12.english: What are... you doing... nngh!? Go die!!

13.chinese: 呼……吓我一跳（小声）嗯？哼，没什么，继续做你的事去吧
13.chineseTL: Huh... you scared me *murmur* Ah? Hmph, it's nothing, go back doing your business
13.japanese: わぅ！……び、びっくり…うん？ふん、なんでもないのだ！仕事するのだ！
13.japaneseTL: Wah!... Y-you scared me... Hm? Hmph, it was nothing! Go back to work!
13.english: Eep! That scared me... Huh? None of your business!

14.chinese: 还有任务剩下，指挥官，你还嫩啊（鄙视）
14.chineseTL: There are missions left, Commander, you're still inexperienced *looks with contempt*
14.japanese: 任務を残すなんて指揮官もまだ若いのだな～
14.japaneseTL: There are unfinished missions left, Commander is so inexperienced~
14.english: How naïve, Commander! You still have tasks left to do!

15.chinese: 任务奖励是……干，干什么，我才没想偷看！我只是事先帮你确认一下！
15.chineseTL: The mission rewards are... w-what, I wasn't thinking of taking a peek! I just wanted to help you confirm beforehand!
15.japanese: 任務の報酬は……なな、なんだ！別に盗み見じゃないのだ！ただ先に確認してあげるだけなのだ！
15.japaneseTL: The mission rewards are... W-w-what! I wasn't taking a peek or anything! I just want to help you confirm beforehand!
15.english: Let's take a little peek... Wh-what am I doing? N-not peeking, of course... I just wanted to check the rewards in advance!

16.chinese: 你的信……可恶，居然比我还要受欢迎
16.chineseTL: Your mail... damn it, you're somehow more popular than me
16.japanese: あんたのメール……ぐぬぬ、このわたしより人気があるとは……
16.japaneseTL: Your mail... Grrr, you're somehow more popular than me...
16.english: Here's your mail... Grrrr, even more popular than me...

17.chinese: 你能平安无事也是多亏了我的幸运，快感谢我吧！
17.chineseTL: Being able to come back safely was all thanks to my luck, better show me some gratitude!
17.japanese: 無事にいられるのはわたしの運があるからなのだ！感謝するがいいのだ！
17.japaneseTL: Being able to come back safely was all thanks to my luck, better show me some gratitude!
17.english: You were only able to return safely because of my luck, so be thankful!

18.chinese: 汪！你确定委托完成时喊一声奖励会更好吗……
18.chineseTL: Wan! Are you sure the rewards will be better if I bark when commissions are completed...
18.japanese: ワン！委託が終わった時に叫べば報酬が良くなるって本当かな……
18.japaneseTL: Wan! When the commissions are over, bark to get better commission rewards... is that true
18.english: Woof! Are you sure that barking increases the likelihood of getting a better reward...?

19.chinese: 注意到雪风大人的伟大了吗？眼光不错嘛
19.chineseTL: Noticed the greatness of the great Yukikaze? You've got good eyes
19.japanese: この雪風様の偉大さに気づいたのか？目がいいのだな~
19.japaneseTL: You realized the greatness of Yukikaze-sama? You've got good eyes~
19.english: So you've noticed Yukikaze's greatness? You have good eyes~

20.chinese: 不要命的话就放马过来吧！
20.chineseTL: Come at me if you wish to lose your lives!
20.japanese: 命が惜しくなければかかってこいなのだ！
20.japaneseTL: Come at me if you don't value your lives!
20.english: If you're done saying your prayers, come at me!

21.chinese: 败者就赶紧给我消失吧，HO,HO,HO！
21.chineseTL: Losers better disappear from my sight, HO, HO, HO!
21.japanese: 敗者はさっさと消え去るのだ！ハッハッハー！
21.english: Losers should hurry up and scram! Wa ha ha!

22.chinese: 哼，要让你们在这里凋零我于心不忍……就放你们一马吧！
22.chineseTL: Hmph, I took pity on you this time... I'll let you go for now!
22.japanese: ふん、ここで倒れる姿は忍びんなのだ……今回見逃してやるのだ！
22.japaneseTL: Hmph, I have to hide my disgraced figure... I'll let you off this time!
22.english: Hmph. I don't want anyone finding out that I lost, so I'm letting you go this time!

24.chinese: 哼，让你们见识雪风大人的真本事！
24.chineseTL: Hmph, I'll let you witness the true skill of the great Yukikaze!
24.japanese: ふん！雪風様の真の力を見せてやるのだ！
24.japaneseTL: Hmph, I'll let you witness Yukikaze-sama's true power!
24.english: Hmph! Witness the true power of Yukikaze the Great!

25.chinese: 你配不上雪风大人的运气呢~
25.chineseTL: You don't deserve the luck of the great Yukikaze~
25.japanese: 雪風様の運にふさわしくないのだ～
25.japaneseTL: You are not worthy of the great Yukikaze-sama's luck~
25.english: You are not worthy of the luck of Yukikaze the Great~

26.chinese: 圣诞老人？那种东西怎么可能存在，你是笨蛋吗？——欸，今年没有圣诞礼物了？等等，等等等等，让我们好好谈谈吧，也许存在也说不定
26.chineseTL: Santa Claus? How would something like that even exist, are you stupid? Eh, no Christmas presents this year? W-w-w-wait! Let's talk this over again, maybe he does exist
26.japanese: サンタクロース？そんなのいるはずがないのだ！馬鹿なのか？ーーあ、あれ？今年はクリスマスプレゼント抜きなのか？ま、待つのだ！ちょっと話すのだ！サンタクロースがもしかしたらいるかもしれないのだー！
26.japaneseTL: Santa Claus? Something like that definitely doesn't exist! Are you stupid?- Ah, err? No Christmas presents this year? W-wait! Let's talk this over again! Santa Claus may or may not exist-!
26.english: Santa Claus? Are you dumb? There's no way something like that could... Huh? There's going to be coal in my stockings this year? W-wait! Let's discuss this! I'm sure there's some possibility that Santa is real!

27.chinese: 你要去游乐园？哼，那种地方我成熟的雪风大人怎么可能喜欢……欸，只是跟我说一声？等等，等等等等，让我们好好谈谈吧，游乐园也是有可取之处的
27.chineseTL: You are going to the amusement park? Hmph, how can the mature great Yukikaze like those kind of places... Eh, you were just telling me? W-w-w-wait! Let's talk this over, amusement parks have good things about them
27.japanese: この雪風様と遊園地に行きたいのか？ふん、そんなとこ、この大人の雪風様が好きなわけな…ええ、言ってみただけなのか！？ま、待つのだ！ちょっと話すのだ！遊園地だっていいところがあるのだー！
27.japaneseTL: You want to go to the amusement park with Yukikaze-sama? Hmph, something like that is not fitting for the mature Yukikaze-sama... Eeh, you were just saying it!? W-wait! Let's talk over it again! There are good things about amusement parks too-!
27.english: You'd like to go to an amusement park with Yukikaze the Great? Hmph! There's no way that I'd do something so childish... Ahh! W-wait, let's talk this over! I'm sure there's some fun to be had at an amusement park!

28.chinese: 约会？哼，优雅的雪风大人才不会随便接受他人的邀约——诶，那就去找别人？等等……你给我站住，你要对雪风大人始乱终弃吗！
28.chineseTL: A date? Hmph, the gallant Yukikaze wouldn't just accept someone's invitation that easily- Eh, you're looking for someone else? W-wait... stand there, were you planning to give up on the great Yukikaze!
28.japanese: デート？ふん、この優雅な雪風様はそう安々と他人の誘いに乗らないーーじゃあ他の人にするの？ま、待て……待つのだ！この雪風様をこのまま放置する気かーー！
28.japaneseTL: A date? Hmph, the gallant Yukikaze-sama wouldn't just accept someone's invitation that easily- Eh, going with someone else? W-wait... Hold up! Are you just going to leave the great Yukikaze-sama by herself-!
28.english: You want to go out with me? Hmph! There's no way the elegant and beautiful Yukikaze would just accept the advances of any random person... W-wait!! Are you seriously going to leave before I have a chance to collect my thoughts?!

29.chinese: 婚纱？哼，终于开始考虑和雪风大人的未来了吗？嗯，这套不错——欸，给别人选的？等等，等……（哽咽）我，我知道我虽然任性，但是——欸，别人的婚礼？你这混蛋！！
29.chineseTL: A wedding dress? Hmph, you finally started thinking about your future with the great Yukikaze? Hm, this one looks great- Eh, you were choosing for someone else? W-w-wait... *sobs* I-I know I'm obstinate, but- Eh, it was for someone else's wedding? You bastard!!
29.japanese: ジューンブライド？ふん、ようやく雪風様との未来を考えるようになったのか？うん、これはいいのだーーええ！ほかの人のために選んだのか？ま、待って……ううっ……自分がわがままだとわかってるけど、でもーーええ！ほかの人の結婚式用？？この馬鹿！！！
29.japaneseTL: June bride? Hmph, you finally started thinking about your future with the great Yukikaze-sama? Hm, this looks good- Eeh! You're picking for someone else? W-wait... Uuu... I know I'm selfish but, but- Eeh! It's for someone else's wedding?? You bastard!
29.english: A wedding dress? So, have you finally started thinking about your eternity of servitude to Yukikaze the Great? Well, you have good taste... Huh? This is for someone else? W-wait... wait... please, I know I'm not perfect, but... Huh? A friend's wedding ceremony? You big jerk!!!

30.chinese: 既然这是你发自内心的请求，雪风大人就大发慈悲收下好了，特别允许你把雪风大人抱起来也没关系哦，来吧，你还在等什么，这可是千载难逢的好机会！
30.chineseTL: Since you requested for this from the bottom of your heart, the great Yukikaze shall compassionately accept it. I'll allow you this special opportunity to princess carry me, come here, what are you waiting for, this is an opportunity of a lifetime!
30.japanese: 心からの願いなんだから、この雪風様がありがたく承諾してあげるのだ！特別に雪風様をお姫様抱っこしてもいいのだぞ！さあ、何を戸惑っているのだ！千載一遇のチャンスなのだぞ！
30.japaneseTL: Since you wished for this from the bottom of your heart, the great Yukikaze-sama will gladly accept it! On this special occasion I'll let you princess carry me! Come here, what are you waiting for! It's an opportunity of a lifetime!
30.english: Since you asked so earnestly, Yukikaze the Great shall grant you a favor and allow you to carry her! Come on, what are you waiting for? It's a once in a lifetime opportunity!

31.chinese: 心怀感激地收下雪风大人的The·阳炎·瓦伦汀·P、Perfect·可可味·手制巧克力吧！好！一口气说完了！一口气说出来了！！
31.chineseTL: Be grateful to receive the great Yukikaze's The-Kagerou-Valentine-P,Perfect-Cocoa-Handmade Chocolate! Good! I said it! I managed to say it!!
31.japanese: この雪風様からのザ・カゲロウタイプ・バレンタイン・ぱ、パーフェイクト・カカオテースト・ハンドメイドチョコレートをありがたく受け取るがいいのだ！……よぉし！言えた！言えのた！！
31.japaneseTL: Be grateful to receive Yukikaze-sama's The-Kagerou type-Valentine-P,Perfect-Cocoa Test-Handmade Chocolate!...Yes! I said it! I said it!!

1.chinese: 终于完成了！“随时随地都能荡的秋千”！怎么样，指挥官，是不是很羡慕，想不想要坐一坐？很遗憾，这是高贵的雪风大人专用的！
1.chineseTL: It's finally done! "Use-It-Anywhere All-Portable Swing"! Commander, are you jealous? Do you want to sit down? Too bad! This is exclusive only for the noble Yukikaze-sama!
1.japanese: あーはっはっは！「どこでも使えるブランコ」がついに完成したのだ！指揮官、羨ましいのか？座りたいのか？でもざーんねーん！これは高貴なる雪風様専用なのだ♪
1.japaneseTL: A-ha-ha-ha! "Use-It-Anywhere-As-Long-As-There-Is-A-Ceiling Swing" is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Do you want to sit down? Too bad! This is exclusive only for the noble Yukikaze-sama!
1.english: Wa ha ha! My "universal-as-long-as-there-is-a-ceiling" swing set is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Want to give it a try? Too~ bad~! This seat is reserved only for the noble and elegant Yukikaze!

2.chinese: 终于完成了！“随时随地都能荡的秋千”！怎么样，指挥官，是不是很羡慕，想不想要坐一坐？很遗憾，这是高贵的雪风大人专用的！
2.chineseTL: It's finally done! "Use-It-Anywhere All-Portable Swing"! Commander, are you jealous? Do you want to sit down? Too bad! This is exclusive only for the noble Yukikaze-sama!
2.japanese: あーはっはっは！「天井さえあればどこでも使えるブランコ」がついに完成したのだ！指揮官、羨ましいのか？座りたいのか？でもざーんねーん！これは高貴なる雪風様専用なのだ♪
2.japaneseTL: A-ha-ha-ha! "Use-It-Anywhere-As-Long-As-There-Is-A-Ceiling Swing" is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Do you want to sit down? Too bad! This is exclusive only for the noble Yukikaze-sama!
2.english: Wa ha ha! My "universal-as-long-as-there-is-a-ceiling" swing set is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Want to give it a try? Too~ bad~! This seat is reserved only for the noble and elegant Yukikaze!

3.chinese: 指挥官，回来的正好，来帮我荡秋千
3.chineseTL: Commander, you're back, come push me in the swing
3.japanese: 指揮官、よく戻ったのだ！さあ！この雪風様をブランコに乗せるのだ！
3.japaneseTL: Commander, you're back! Come here! Push Yukikaze-sama on this swing!
3.english: Commander, good timing! I shall allow you to help push my swing!

4.chinese: 虽然这套洋装很合身，但是荡秋千的时候总觉得有点碍事，唔唔……难以抉择！
4.chineseTL: Although this dress fits me very well, it somehow gets in the way a bit when I get on the swing, hmmm... it's hard to decide!
4.japanese: この洋服はこの雪風様に似合っているのだけど、ブランコに乗るとなんか邪魔……ええい、どうすればいいのだ！
4.japaneseTL: Although this dress fits me very well, it gets in the way when I get on the swing, hmmm... what should I do!
4.english: Even though this dress perfectly suits Yukikaze the Great, it makes it hard to play on the swings... Urgh... what should I do?!

5.chinese: 啊，我能感觉到指挥官在看着我，但是秋千是只属于本雪风大人的，我是个多么罪孽深重的女人啊，HO,HO,HO！
5.chineseTL: Ah, I can feel the Commander looking at me, but the swing belongs only the the great Yukikaze, I'm such a sinful woman, HO, HO, HO!
5.japanese: 指揮官、こっちを見てる……しかーし！このブランコは雪風様専用なのだ！遊ばせてあげないのだ♪はーはっはっは！雪風様はなんて罪な子なのだ！
5.japaneseTL: Commander, is looking over here... But! This swing is exclusive only for the great Yukikaze-sama! I'm not letting you play with it♪ Ha-Ha-Ha! Yukikaze-sama is such a sinful girl!
5.english: Ahh, I can feel Commander's longing gazes... but alas! This swing set is for Yukikaze the Great, and no one else! Wa ha ha! Am I not downright evil?

6.chinese: 洋装？哼哼，虽然早就听腻了，不过特别允许你赞扬雪风大人的美貌！
6.chineseTL: This dress? Hoho, although I got tired of hearing it already, I'll allow you to praise the beauty of the great Yukikaze on this special occasion!
6.japanese: お洋服が可愛いのか？ふん！褒め言葉は聞き飽きたのだ！…けど、特別に褒めることを許してあげるのだ！
6.japaneseTL: The dress is cute? Hmph! I'm tired of these compliments!... But, I'll let you praise me on this special ocassion!
6.english: My gothic dress? Heheh~ You might think I've gotten tired of hearing it, but... I shall allow you to praise the beauty of Yukikaze the Great! Haha!

7.chinese: 秋千荡多了会变笨，要用工作来缓解？！真的吗！……唔，没、没办法
7.chineseTL: I'm going to become stupid if I swing too much, working will be able to relieve it?! Really?!... Hm, i-it can't be helped
7.japanese: お仕事をしないでブランコ遊びばかりすると馬鹿になる…？本当なのか！……ぐぬぬ……しょ、しょうがないのだ！
7.japaneseTL: I'll become stupid if I don't do work and keep on swinging...? Really!... Grrr... I-It can't be helped then!
7.english: Swinging around too much shakes around your brain and makes you stupid...? And the only way to fix it is to stay in one spot and work? Really?! Um, I suppose... it can't be helped then...

8.chinese: 对，就是这样，指挥官，再用力一点也没关系！哇~飞起来啦！
8.chineseTL: Just like that, Commander, you can use a bit more force! Wah~ I can fly!
8.japanese: そうそう、そうなのだ！指揮官、もっと力を入れるのだ！はははは！飛んでいるのだー！
8.japaneseTL: Yes yes, just like that! Commander, use more force! Hahahaha! I'm flying-!
8.english: Yes, yes! That's right, Commander, put your back into it! Wa ha haaaahh!! I'm flyingggg~!

9.chinese: 哇啊啊啊！吓死我了，差点摔下来……指挥官，受死吧！
9.chineseTL: Waaaah! You scared me good, almost fell down!... Commander, die!
9.japanese: ふにゃああ！び、びっくりした！！……うぐぐぐ…指揮官はもう死んじゃえ！
9.japaneseTL: Funyaaaa! Y-you scared me!!... Uguu... Commander, die!
9.english: Funyaaaagh! Th-that scared me half to death!! Dumb Commander, go die already!

10.chinese: 你以为这是秋千，其实是鱼雷哒！
10.chineseTL: You thought this was a swing, it was really a torpedo mount!
10.japanese: ただのブランコだと思ったのか？本当は魚雷発射管なのだ！
10.japaneseTL: You thought this was a swing? In reality it's a torpedo mount!
10.english: You thought this was just a regular swing set, but behold! Torpedo tubes!

11.chinese: 以为雪风大人只想要享乐就大错特错啦！
11.chineseTL: If you thought I'm only here to play, you have committed a big mistake!
11.japanese: 雪風様が遊んでいるだけだと思ったら大間違いなのだ！
11.japaneseTL: You've made a big bistake if you thought the great Yukikaze-sama is here to play!
11.english: If you think Yukikaze the Great is simply here for fun and games, you'd be dead wrong!

1.chinese: 这身衣服好漂亮啊，诶嘿嘿……啊——咳咳！从今以后，你就是雪风大人最重要的另一半了，可不允许擅自消失，明白了吗！
1.chineseTL: These clothes are so cute, ehehehe... Ah!! A-ahem! From now on, you are the great Yukikaze's most important person! I won't allow you to just disappear when you please! Understand?
1.japanese: この服カワイイよね、えへへへ……あっ！！こ、コホン！あんたはこれから、この雪風様の大切な付き人になるのだ！勝手にいなくなるのは許さないのだ！分かったのか？
1.japaneseTL: These clothes are so cute, ehehehe... Ah!! A-ahem! From now on, you are the great Yukikaze-sama's most important person! I won't allow you to just disappear when you please! Understand?
1.english: This outfit is sooo cute~ ehehe... Ack!! *cough* *cough*! Ahem! From now on, you are the faithful companion of Yukikaze the Great! As such, you will not be permitted to leave my side, understood?

2.chinese: 这身衣服好漂亮啊，诶嘿嘿……啊——咳咳！从今以后，你就是雪风大人最重要的另一半了，可不允许擅自消失，明白了吗！
2.chineseTL: These clothes are so cute, ehehehe... Ah!! A-ahem! From now on, you are the great Yukikaze's most important person! I won't allow you to just disappear when you please! Understand?
2.japanese: この服カワイイよね、えへへへ……あっ！！こ、コホン！あんたはこれから、この雪風様の大切な付き人になるのだ！勝手にいなくなるのは許さないのだ！分かったのか？
2.japaneseTL: These clothes are so cute, ehehehe... Ah!! A-ahem! From now on, you are the great Yukikaze-sama's most important person! I won't allow you to just disappear when you please! Understand?
2.english: This outfit is sooo cute~ ehehe... Ack!! *cough* *cough*! Ahem! From now on, you are the faithful companion of Yukikaze the Great! As such, you will not be permitted to leave my side, understood?

3.chinese: 看到指挥官就想上去蹭蹭呢——诶嘿嘿，好舒服~
3.chineseTL: Seeing Commander makes me want to cuddle... Ehehe, so comfortable~
3.japanese: 指揮官を見るとスリスリしたくなるのだ――えへへへ～気持ちいいのだ♪
3.japaneseTL: Seeing Commander makes me want to cuddle- Ehehehe~ It feels so good♪
3.english: Commander, I want to rub against you every time I see you... Ehehe~ so comfy~♪

4.chinese: 有雪风大人陪在你身边，厄运什么的早就飞走啦！
4.chineseTL: With the great Yukikaze by your side, all the misfortunes will be blown away!
4.japanese: この雪風様がそばにいたおかげで、悪運などとっくに消えてなくなったのだ！
4.japaneseTL: With the great Yukikaze-sama by your side, every misfortune will disappear!
4.english: As long as Yukikaze the Great is at your side, bad luck and whatnot shall be banished forever!

5.chinese: 再多黏着雪风大人也是可以的哦！毕竟你可是雪风大人看上的指挥官！
5.chineseTL: It's okay to stick closer to the great Yukikaze! After all, you are the Commander the great Yukikaze had her eyes on!
5.japanese: もっと雪風様と一緒にいてもいいのだぞ♪だってあんたは～この雪風様が見初めた指揮官なのだぞ♪
5.japaneseTL: It's okay to get closer with the great Yukikaze-sama♪ Because you are~ the Commander the great Yukikaze-sama settled on♪
5.english: Spend as much time with Yukikaze the Great as you please! After all, you are the one who I have chosen!

6.chinese: 下次的约会就一起去赏花吧！（小声）又能一起约会了，诶嘿嘿~
6.chineseTL: Let's go flower viewing on our next date! *murmur* We're going on a date again, ehehe~
6.japanese: 次のデートは…お花見にいきたいのだ♪（小声）またデートできるよね～えへへ～
6.japaneseTL: Next date... let's go flower viewing♪ *murmur* We're going on a date again~ Ehehe~
6.english: For our next date, you shall take me to view the cherry blossoms~♪ (Ahh, I'm so glad I'll get to go on another date~ ehehe~)

7.chinese: 诶嘿嘿，指挥官的摸摸好舒服~
7.chineseTL: Ehehe, Commander's touch is so comfortable~
7.japanese: えへへ～指揮官、さわさわしてくれて気持ちいいのだ♪
7.japaneseTL: Ehehe~ Commander, your touch feels so good♪
7.english: Ehehe~ Commander, your rub-rub feels so nice~♪

8.chinese: 成，成熟的雪风大人早就习，习惯这些了！唔，唔……
8.chineseTL: T-the adult Yukikaze already got u-used to i-it! Uu, uuu...
8.japanese: お、大人の雪風様はこれぐらいなな、なんともないのだ！あぅ……うぅ………
8.japaneseTL: T-the adult Yukikaze-sama doesn't mind s-something like this! Uu... Uuu...
8.english: The Great and M-Mature Yukikaze h-has long been accustomed to these kinds of things! Ah.... ahhn...

9.chinese: 还有任务啊。没关系，我来帮助你一起完成吧！
9.chineseTL: There are still missions left. No problem, I'll help you finish them!
9.japanese: まだ任務があるのか？問題ないのだ。この雪風様が手伝ってあげるのだ！
9.japaneseTL: There are still missions left? No problem. Let the great Yukikaze-sama help you out!
9.english: Still have missions left? Fear not. Yukikaze the Great shall lend you her aid!

10.chinese: 任务奖励有很多很多呢~哼哼，这里面可有一半的功劳是雪风大人的！
10.chineseTL: There are lots of mission rewards~ Hehe, half of the credit goes to the great Yukikaze!
10.japanese: 任務報酬がいっぱいなのだー！ふふん、半分ぐらいはこの雪風様のおかげなのだ♪
10.japaneseTL: There are so many mission rewards-! Hehe, half of the credit goes to the great Yukikaze-sama!
10.english: Behold all the mission rewards! Heh, roughly half of this bounty was due to the efforts of Yukikaze the Great!

11.chinese: 有你的信呢！等等，该，该不会是花心……
11.chineseTL: There's mail for you! W-wait, you aren't being unfaithful, r-right...
11.japanese: あんたにメールなのだ！待て、も、もももしかしてフリンでは……
11.japaneseTL: There's mail for you! Wait, a-a-a-are you perhaps having an affair...
11.english: There's mail for you! Wait... W-w-wait a second! Are you cheating on me?

12.chinese: 委托完成了啦！快点去迎接她们，然后回到我的身边来啦！
12.chineseTL: Commissions complete! Go welcome them quickly, then come back to my side!
12.japanese: 委託が完了したのだ！早くみんなを迎えに行って、そしてこの雪風様のそばに帰ってくるのだ！
12.japaneseTL: Commissions are complete! Quickly go welcome them back, then come back to Yukikaze-sama's side!
12.english: A commission has been finished! Make haste to welcome the others back, then promptly return to my side!

13.chinese: 那个那个，我们什么时候出发呀？就是上次说的约会——先说好了，这次雪风大人只负责玩，其它的全部交给你了呢！你可要好好负责哦！……嗯！诶嘿嘿～最喜欢你了～
13.chineseTL: Hey hey, when are we going? I'm talking about our promised date- Let me be clear first though, this time the great Yukikaze will only be in charge of playing, I'll leave everything else to you! Better be responsible! Ehehe~ I love you the most~
13.japanese: ねえねえ、いつ行くのだ？…この前言ってたデートなのだ！――雪風様は今回遊び担当で、ほかのことはぜんぶあんたに任せたのだから、ちゃんと責任を取るのだぞ！…うん！えへへへ～大好き～
13.japaneseTL: Hey hey, when are we going?... I'm talking about our promised date!- Yukikaze-sama will be in charge of playing this time, I'll let you take care of everything else, so make sure to be responsible!... Hm! Ehehehe~ I love you~
13.english: Hey, hey! When are we going? ...Of course, the date I talked about before! Yukikaze the Great shall be responsible for having as much fun as possible, and the rest of the responsibilities shall be yours! You can take care of it, right? ...Mhm! Ehehe~ I love you~
